TopicTitle: Orbital debris with low Atmo Pe

Articles.Content:
Seems like this should be stock behaviour, but is there any mod that deletes debris with a Periapsis that dips far into atmo in orbit around bodies with atmospheres?
I could probably write a python script to process the savefile that accomplishes this, but have no experience with modding.

It is stock behavior. Stock is just more generous than you expect/want it to be.

Put your Kerbin periapsis below 20 km and the debris will vanish.

I personally delete any debris in atmo in the tracking station.
